Your local team of experts

We have been servicing and working with builders from Northern NSW across the Gold Coast and in Brisbane and surrounding areas for many years.

If you are a Builder, Home Builder, Renovator or a Commercial Builder—have peace of mind that Millennium Glass are experts, reliable and qualified.

Read testimonials or references from some of our builders.

Go to Testimonials

Awards

One of our builders who we supply and fit for ‘Space constructions’ are the recent winners of the ‘HIH Australian Display Home of the year 2017’

We can work to designers specifications and are experienced in fitting for show homes and display suites.

We are experienced with large projects and work with builders and interior decorators across the Gold Coast who specialise in luxury apartments and units.

We are repair and replacement specialists and work with property managers to replace all glass in older style buildings floor by floor.

We supply and fit balustrading solutions in buildings and homes.

We work with contractors, cabinet makers, property managers.

We sell wholesale—Contact us to see if you qualify.
